description: Master the basics of data analysis by manipulating common data structures such as vectors, matrices and data frames.

titleCourse: Data Analysis in R, the data.table Way
description: Master core concepts in data manipulation such as subsetting, updating, indexing and joining your data using data.table.

titleCourse: Data Manipulation in R with dplyr
description: Master techniques for data manipulation using the select, mutate, filter, arrange, and summarise functions in dplyr.

titleCourse: Data Visualization in R with ggvis
description: Learn to create interactive graphs to display distributions, relationships, model fits, and more using ggvis.
Learn to create interactive analyses and automated reports with R Markdown.
Continue your journey to become an R ninja by learning about conditional statements, loops, and vector functions.
Learn to train and assess models performing common machine learning tasks such as classification and clustering.
authorOccupation: Doctoral Student at Vrije Universiteit Brussel

description: Learn to explore your data so you can properly clean and prepare it for analysis.

titleCourse: Intro to Python for Data Science
description: Master the basics of data analysis in Python. Expand your skill set by learning scientific computing with numpy.
Strengthen your knowledge of the topics you learned in Intermediate R with a ton of new and fun exercises.
Learn how to use Python to analyze customer churn and build a model to predict it.
authorOccupation: Senior Data Scientist at Alliance Data
